definition: to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including
frost/white powder or cream spread over a surface/frosting/(skin) cream

sentences.english: The front defrosting duct assembly and the dashboard body are assembled together.
sentences.chinese: 前除霜風道總成和儀表板本體裝配在一起。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a cooler having a defrosting heater and an object storing device.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及帶除霜加熱器的冷卻器及物品儲藏裝置。

sentences.english: At present the defrosting methods of air cooler are"melting".
sentences.chinese: 目前空冷器的除霜多采用“融霜”的辦法。

sentences.english: Also, in the defrosting process, the hot water temperature fluctuates was within 5℃.
sentences.chinese: 除霜過程中系統供熱水溫度波動在5℃以內。

sentences.english: This icebox is able to be automatically defrosted.
The max. Operation time without defrosting is approx. 24 hrs.
sentences.chinese: 不除霜的最長工作時間約24小時。

sentences.english: Disclosed is a passenger car defroster.
When the coil temperature rose to 9 degrees or so the end of the cream immediately.
sentences.chinese: 當盤管溫度回升至9度左右除霜立即結束。

sentences.english: The fuzzy control defrosting of air-resource heat pump is completed.
sentences.chinese: 對空氣源熱泵進行了模糊除霜控制的實驗研究。

sentences.english: Avoid the use of self-defrosting freezers for the storage of samples.
sentences.chinese: 不要使用具有自除霜功能的冰箱。

sentences.english: Defrost the fridge regularly so that it works at maximum efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 定期給冰箱除霜，以便它能發揮其最高效率。

sentences.english: The refrigerator's defrosting function is very good.
sentences.chinese: 這個冰箱除霜的功能很好。

sentences.english: You do not have to defrost this refrigerator because it is equipped with an automatic defroster.
sentences.chinese: 你不必給這個冰箱除霜，因爲它配有自動除霜器。

sentences.english: You do not have to defrost this refrigerator because it is equipped with an automatic defroster.
sentences.chinese: 你不必給這個冰箱除霜，因爲它配有自動除霜器。

sentences.english: This system also supplies heat to the passenger compartment and the window defroster.
sentences.chinese: 這個系統可以給乘客艙和車窗除霜器提供熱量。

sentences.english: Device does not automatically defrost refrigerators that can be used the following method is fast defrosting .
sentences.chinese: 沒有自動除霜裝置的電冰箱，可用下面方法快速除霜。

definition: to defrost/to get rid of ice
air conditioning/air conditioner (including units that have a heating mode)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
